Reviews.Content: Lovely little hotel What a find! Just by accident we came by this small hotel. They have several rooms starting from $25 wich have cold water and a fan. We stayed in a standard room, basic but fine. Staff is very friendly and pool is nice. Included breakfast is basic, but for a very small amount you can order extra's. Drinks are pretty cheap. The beach is only 1 minute away.
Reviews.Author: JonandMar

Reviews.Content: idyllisch, ruhig, aber Zimmer basic   showReview(22076714, 'full');
Reviews.Author: naganaga
